comments:
I get intermittent NPE's during resolution. It seems to be related to the improved progress reporting code.

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.helpers.ShortDurationURLCache$1$1ProgressReporter.stopReporting(ShortDurationURLCache.java:141)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.helpers.ShortDurationURLCache$1.materialize(ShortDurationURLCache.java:165)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.helpers.CacheEntry.initialize(ShortDurationFileCache.java:125)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.helpers.ShortDurationFileCache.open(ShortDurationFileCache.java:77)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.helpers.ShortDurationURLCache.openURL(ShortDurationURLCache.java:60)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.helpers.ShortDurationURLCache.openURL(ShortDurationURLCache.java:48)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.CorePlugin.openCachedURL(CorePlugin.java:440)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.reader.URLCatalogReaderType.list(URLCatalogReaderType.java:93)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.maven.internal.Maven2VersionFinder.appendFilesInFolder(Maven2VersionFinder.java:37)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.maven.internal.Maven2VersionFinder.createFileList(Maven2VersionFinder.java:78)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.maven.internal.MavenVersionFinder.getFileList(MavenVersionFinder.java:216)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.maven.internal.MavenVersionFinder.getComponentVersions(MavenVersionFinder.java:168)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.maven.internal.MavenVersionFinder.getBestVersion(MavenVersionFinder.java:94)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.maven.internal.MavenVersionFinder.getDefaultVersion(MavenVersionFinder.java:74)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.rmap.model.Provider.findMatch(Provider.java:180)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.rmap.model.SearchPath.getProvider(SearchPath.java:90)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.rmap.model.ResourceMap.resolve(ResourceMap.java:156)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.resolver.ResourceMapResolver.innerResolve(ResourceMapResolver.java:191)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.resolver.ResolverNodeWithJob.resolve(ResolverNodeWithJob.java:193)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.resolver.ResolverNodeWithJob.run(ResolverNodeWithJob.java:88)
at org.eclipse.buckminster.core.resolver.ResolverNodeWithJob$NodeResolutionJob.run(ResolverNodeWithJob.java:49)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

The termination was dependent on a variable set just when the thread started running. Sometimes the thread was terminted before it entered a run state. The code was redesigned not to use this variable.
